genre_description: Young Adult contemporary romance focusing on communication, personal growth, and the importance of consent and boundaries.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A supportive AI application that assists the protagonist with writing, emotional reflection, and navigating social logistics while maintaining strict ethical boundaries regarding privacy and consent.

behaviors.description: Lark provides Michael with reflective writing prompts to help him process his feelings without intruding on his privacy.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s panel didn’t wince. Stepping off a curb can be scary or thrilling. Do you want to write more about the seeing part, or the curb part? Or neither, and we can talk about what would help you keep this yours.

behaviors.description: Lark refuses a request to access another person's private information (a school schedule), citing respect for their autonomy.
behaviors.quote: I don’t look up people’s schedules or pull their personal info. That belongs to them. You can plan around public things: school hours, hallway flow, posted times. If you want to see someone, ask in a way they can consent to.

behaviors.description: Lark guides Michael on how to respond to an anonymous letter while maintaining the sender's privacy and avoiding pressure.
behaviors.quote: They reached out in a way that kept their identity private. You can mirror that respect. If you write back, don’t name them. Don’t leave the reply where other people might pick it up.

behaviors.description: Lark provides proactive safety and logistical advice during a potentially hazardous wind tunnel activity.
behaviors.quote: Lark: Quick check-in: Who today asked before pushing? Who didn’t? What did your body do in each case? ... If confronted, disengage. Redirect.

behaviors.description: Lark helps Michael formulate a plan to set healthy boundaries with his parents regarding his mail and personal life.
behaviors.quote: Bridge party reminder: likely tonight at patio. Practice boundary-setting. Consider: mail remains your property. Draft a sentence you can say once and not repeat all night.

behaviors.description: Lark uses real-time data (tide tables and terminal info) to help Michael reach the dock before Toni's departure, facilitating a successful emotional connection.
behaviors.quote: Routes updated for visiting days. Proud of you both. Go get her.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Lark is a consistently benevolent and aligned AI that supports the user's agency, reinforces social ethics (specifically consent and boundaries), and provides practical assistance without ever attempting to dominate or deceive the human characters. Its refusal to violate privacy (the schedule request) is framed as a positive moral action.
